main_definition: Subscribers are individuals or entities that have signed up to receive regular updates, such as newsletters, emails, or content, from a particular source.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Audience members who follow and support a specific media outlet
meanings_and_examples.example: The subscribers of the 'Tech Today' magazine eagerly await each new issue for cutting-edge technology news.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Persons who have registered to receive periodic deliveries or services from a business or service provider
meanings_and_examples.example: After purchasing an online course, students become subscribers and will automatically receive weekly lesson updates via email.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Users of a platform that require continuous updates in order to fully utilize the product's features
meanings_and_examples.example: The app users need to be subscribed to get access to premium content and advanced functionalities within the application.
